channel.title: The Funniest Person on YouTube / The Worst Person on YouTube?
channel.description:
In my opinion, the funniest person I have ever seen on YouTube is Nigahiga, plainly because he did a couple of these video and I became a fan of him since then:
Asian Boy - http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-hS-n1SAdzQ&feature=player_embedded
Word of The Day: Pwned - http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Fhb89V43KWc&feature=channel
However, the worst person on YouTube is almost tie between Fred and itschriscrocker -- Now you all know who Fred is, he's that kid who just makes his voice high pitched and people find it funny, well, I don't.
And I am sure you all know chriscocksucker for he is that faggot who dresses like a girl, and try's to say he is one. You all know him from "Leave Britney Alone" guy, but he's just a psycho:
Leave Britney Alone! -http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kHmvkRoEowc&feature=PlayList&p=A2C58CDFF32FA25C&index=0&playnext=1
His Latest Video - http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2JNcH0QqzZ4
He even tried to make himself look good on his channel; I think he's the worst person on YouTube [b]ever[/b].

item.title: The Funniest Person on YouTube / The Worst Person on YouTube?
item.dc:creator: @dragonfire455 dragonfire455
item.description:
@dragonfire455 wrote:

[quote=“io9, post:13, topic:278707”][quote author=PeterMan link=topic=367880.msg2786800#msg2786800 date=1242525025]

Nobody gives a shit. Hurrah for another useless thread by dragonfur.

You are only looking for an excuse to call him dragonfur/furfag etc.

So you are not any better.
[/quote]
If you really insist, I can edit that post.[/quote]…What difference would that make if you did edit your post?

[quote=“Chassy13, post:12, topic:278707”]Funniest: Nigahiga or Smosh
Worst: Fred[/quote]I’ve watched some of Smosh’s videos and he’s pretty funny not better than Nigahiga’s though.

[quote=“Kane., post:10, topic:278707”]I enjoy watching Chris Crockers video, haha.
Fred is the least appealing person to watch, and his video’s aren’t funny, don’t know why he’s still going.[/quote]He even has t-shirts selling, it’s depressing in a way.

[quote=“Elijah, post:11, topic:278707”][quote author=dragonfire455 link=topic=367880.msg2786872#msg2786872 date=1242528615]

stop posting you fucking moron
[/quote]Stop breathing please.

kthxbai

lol The funniest part about that post. Is it’s one of the very few posts you have left to make till one of the staffers get sick of your stupid shit and ban you.[/quote]What’s funny is, I just made another post and have yet to be banned, I have the right to criticize and defend myself.

[quote=“Halogenisation, post:1, topic:278918”]How much for furs?[/quote]Use eBay, good place for cosplay costumes.

Read full topic
item.source: The Funniest Person on YouTube / The Worst Person on YouTube?
